questions.question: You are a student with a B1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 80 words. If you had 1 million euros; what would you do with it?

answers.answer: 1. I would invest a portion of the money to generate passive income. 2. I would donate a significant amount to charity. 3. I would travel to various countries to broaden my cultural horizons. 4. I would also spend some on personal development, such as learning a new language or skill. 5. I would ensure a comfortable financial future for my family and loved ones.
